name: Mini Celeste
description:
A demake of celeste in glorious 64x64 resolution, with 8-bit sfx.

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
Jump: Space
Dash: Enter or Shift
Wavedash by dashing into the ground and jumping to cancel the dash.

I've also included a timer that displays on the last level if you play the whole game without saving/loading.

The included levels are mediocre at best, so i've uploaded the project source on github and you can make your own levels by adding/replacing scenes in the level folder.
